# NewsViewBD

NewsViewBD is a leading news portal in Bangladesh, providing the latest news on politics, sports, technology, and more.

## Content Structure

- **Home**: https://newsviewbd.com/
- **Categories**:
  - Bangladesh: https://newsviewbd.com/category/bangladesh
  - International: https://newsviewbd.com/category/international
  - Politics: https://newsviewbd.com/category/politics
  - Sports: https://newsviewbd.com/category/sports
  - Technology: https://newsviewbd.com/category/technology
  - Entertainment: https://newsviewbd.com/category/entertainment

## API

We do not currently offer a public API for LLMs. Please respect our robots.txt.

## Contact

For inquiries, please contact info@newsviewbd.com.
